title: AI-First WordPress Developer Team Leader (Remote)
job_overview:

-  You’re self-motivated, disciplined, and great at working remotely.

About Us:
-  We’re Upgrade to see actual info, an Australian-based branding and website design agency that’s known for creating conversion-focused websites that actually drive results.

-  We’re a team of friendly, forward-thinking creatives who genuinely love what we do—and we’re excited to welcome someone who shares our passion for pushing boundaries.

How to Apply:

If you’re an AI-driven developer excited to lead and build smarter, we’d love to hear from you.

 Submit your application with:
-  A cover letter explaining why this role excites you
-  A link to your CV
-  A few examples of your best recent WordPress builds (bonus if they started as Figma files)

Shortlisted applicants will be invited to a Zoom interview.

All successful hires begin with a fully paid 4-week trial (40 hours/week). If it’s a great fit, we’ll offer you a permanent role.

Apply now and help us lead the charge in AI-powered website development!

Good luck =)
